Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists

Class HostList

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists.HostList
public class HostList
extends java.lang.Object
HostList is a collection of operations on lists of hosts.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0

    • getById

      public static <T extends Host> T getById​(java.util.List<T> hostList, int id)
      Gets the Machine object for a particular ID.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic type
      Parameters:
      hostList - the host list
      id - the host ID
      Returns:
      the Machine object or null if no machine exists
      See Also:
      gridsim.Machine

    • setPeStatus

      public static <T extends Host> boolean setPeStatus​(java.util.List<T> hostList, int status, int hostId, int peId)
      Sets the particular Pe status on a Machine.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic type
      Parameters:
      hostList - the host list
      status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      hostId - the host id
      peId - the pe id
      Returns:
      true if the Pe status has changed, false otherwise (Machine id or Pe id might not be exist)
